ErrorMiddleware vs ErrorController

Dinoloop has support for multiple ErrorMiddleware but single ErrorController. This guide explains you the why.

Why Multiple ErrorMiddlewares?

Expressjs has robust error handling using error middlewares. Dinoloop wants this great feature in its core. Awesome to have it :). Somehow, We do have a problem. How do you figure out this middleware handles logic for global error handler? You either have to walkthrough all the middlewares logic or have consistent filename.

Here comes the ErrorController to solve this problem.

Why Single ErrorController?

To me/others know exactly where to put application error logic. 


    

    
    
        
  • ErrorController is the last error handler in dinoloop, once the error goes out of its scope, it reaches to expressjs.
            Now expressjs can decide to crash the container or handle it.
